name: mycraft (holmium)
description:
A minecraft clone that was started several years ago. Long abandoned, hopefully it'll be useful for people looking to create thier own.

I've povided a built version for x64 Windows. Will most likely need a C#/C++ dev environment for all the depenencies to be met. Uses OpenGL for rendering.

Check out the source code here:

https://github.com/marschium/mycraft

Some features:

  • Biomes
  • Fire that spreads
  • Explosions!
  • Trees and other decorations
  • Water with basic physics
  • Basic lighting
